title: Are AMA's allowed here? If so AMA.
body:
I know most of you will instantly downvote me, and it really doesn't phase me, but maybe if you guys know me o n better scale we may bond better.
And of course, that you guys may not see me just as a pathetic troll, I'll answer everything truthfully, I kinda didn't want to post it at this time as it may drop off and get no attention, lol. But whatever, ask anything, and I mean anything. I'll reply to each comment when I wake up.

replies.body: How many times have you had a staring contest with a duck?

> How many times have you had a staring contest with a duck?

Once, and thats because it was coming after my bread at the park :( I had to warn it of.

> Little big planet? Your Ign.

Yep, however I was gonna change down the way, it was just an easy name to use.

> **Millennium Falcon** or *Ebon Hawk*?

Why must you start with a damn Star Wars question, I was never really into Star Wars. However the Millennium Falcon has to be better just because of the crew that operates it; not dissing Ebon Hawk as it looks amazing, damn Star Wars, so complicated. :(

> Why must you start with a damn Star Wars question

It's my go to question in AMAs and I secretly judge people based on their choice.

> > Why must you start with a damn Star Wars question
> 
> It's my go to question in AMAs and I secretly judge people based on their choice.

Damn, now I'm scared.
